Who, what, where I am.

I'm a software developer who loves building and working with transit and urban planning tools. Currently in NYC by way of San Diego, St. Louis, and then Boston. A recent graduate from both MIT and the Recurse Center, I'm currently working on a number of projects that deal with transit mapping and scenario modelling with the MIT Media Lab and the Singapore-MIT Alliance for Research and Technology. Click for more about me and my work.
